author: Ramiro Salinas
text: I’m glad Kristen Stewart lost the award. I couldn’t take anymore bullshit tonight.  #AcademyAwards2022

author: Ramiro Salinas
text: Being a @JGSchneid fan this season was not on my 2022 loteria card, but alas, here we are.  Will you welcome me to the team @JGSchneid #rhonj
